title: How to make a Coffee Milkshake with Nespresso VertuoLine
description:
Nespresso is once again revolutionizing the world of coffee by launching the new VertuoLine system, which produces freshly brewed Coffee and authentic Espresso, with a rich and generous crema.

Get creative and enjoy a sweet refreshment with this milky delight that promises the rich taste of vanilla and the cool, velvety feel of ice cream.
